# 5.2.6 optimal solution

catalog <- read.table("tests-examples/55-tests/tables/18-1.txt", sep =",", header=T)
catalog
suppliers <- read.table("tests-examples/55-tests/tables/18-3.txt", sep =",", header=T)
suppliers
datout <- read.table("tests-examples/55-tests/tables/49.out", sep =",", header=T)
datout

df1=inner_join(catalog,suppliers) %>% 
group_by(P_id) %>% summarise (meancost = mean(cost))
out <- inner_join(catalog,suppliers) %>%inner_join(df1) %>%
filter(meancost == cost) %>%select(P_id, S_name)
